definition: to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: We were invited to Mr. Davidson's residence in Beverley Hills.
sentences.chinese: 我们受邀到戴维森先生去比佛利山庄的住所。

sentences.english: This was the emergency call from the house where he was living.
sentences.chinese: 消息来自于他现居住的住所的紧急求救电话。

sentences.english: For code numbers for living environment and per capita living area, please refer to appendix 2.
sentences.chinese: 居住环境编码包括住所型及人均居住面积请阅附二。

sentences.english: The original of The Corporate Business License should be laid up in an eye-catching place of the company's residence.
sentences.chinese: 营业执照正本应放在企业法人住所醒目的位置。

sentences.english: Five doctors have been stationed at the temporary shelter.
sentences.chinese: 五位医生派驻在临时住所。

sentences.english: Accommodation varies from simple guesthouses to luxury accommodation. Patong has got everything a tourist needs.
sentences.chinese: 住宿从简单的客栈到华贵的住所都有。

sentences.english: The buildings house workers at what was once the world highest-producing natural gas field.
sentences.chinese: 公寓是曾经世界产量最高的天然气田的职工住所。

sentences.english: A penitent cell would have been your home long ago.
sentences.chinese: 一间悔过房早就应该成为你的住所了。

sentences.english: A week ago, he opened his residence to journalists.
sentences.chinese: 一个星期前，他对记者开放自己的住所。

sentences.english: Tolerate no uncleanliness ni body, clothes, or habitation.
sentences.chinese: 身体，衣物和住所都应保持整洁。

sentences.english: We cannot make any promise without your deposit.
sentences.chinese: 不付定金本住所不做任何留房承诺。

sentences.english: There are thousands of people who do not have homes or shelters.
sentences.chinese: 有数不清的人没有家或住所。

sentences.english: The animals are being blamed for a series of home and vehicle break-ins.
sentences.chinese: 他们为一系列闯如住所和汽车的行为而受到责骂。

sentences.english: If the garage is attached, those fumes can also enter the house.
sentences.chinese: 如果车库与住宅是一体的，这些气体还会进入住所。

sentences.english: I also request the people of the United States to display the flag at half-staff from their homes for the customary forenoon period.
sentences.chinese: 我也要求美国人民在自己的住所依午前传统降半旗。

sentences.english: On a routine inspection I discovered a dormant domiciliary account with a BAL.
sentences.chinese: 在定期检查我发现了与BAL的一个休眠住所的帐户。

definition: to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
to stay for a time/to stop over/to lodge/to sink down (into soft ground)/leftovers
